name: Which way is it?
description:
"Which way is it?" is a choice based survival game. Each level has certain number of doors, from which the player needs to make a choice. The correct choice made by player will lead to the next level while the wrong one will make him face the player. If the player chooses the wrong door, the game is restarted again from the beginning.

There are 10 levels in the game with each level having increasing number of doors.

REQUIREMENTS

1.     A system running Windows/Mac

2.     Mouse and Keyboard.

DEVELOPER NOTES

The game is currently in testing phase. 

Hope you enjoy playing the game. It is my first fully completed project that I can post here.

APRIL 2, 2018:

Improved the collision system.

Uploaded  Gameplay.

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

1.   Extract the .zip file.

2.   Run the executable .exe file.
